description:
Luffy remembers how he was advised by his friends, how he was saved by his comrades, and the frustrations of being defeated. As Kaido mocks him to his face, the Color of the Supreme King Haki gushes out and they clash again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Surclasser l`Empereur. Luffy ou le poing de la rébellion !
Surpass the Emperor of the Sea! Luffy Strikes Back with an Iron Fist!
Yonkou o Koero: Luffy Hangeki no Tekken
Übertriff den Kaiser – Ruffys Eisenfäuste holen zum Gegenschlag aus
Превзойти Йонко! Луффи наносит удар Железным Кулаком!
التّغلّب على اليونكو! يردّ لوفي الهجوم بقبضة حديديّة!
四皇を超えろ ルフィ反撃の鉄拳
